original_title: Cine Pornô – Fragmentos de Desejo e Medo
overview: The film shows, in an experimental and documentary way, the degraded environment and the sexual atmosphere of the porn theaters in downtown Rio de Janeiro. Spaces, once majestic cinemas, have become unhealthy places in a context where anonymity, solitude, darkness and sexual promiscuity elevate the human psyche to extreme levels.
title: Cine Pornô – Fragmentos de Desejo e Medo
